June 17, 2006 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
The Year of the Dragon
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn ('Love Divine' - arr, Philip Wilby): 1 Mount Charles, 90 2 Bodmin, 88 3 Camborne, 87
Best Player: Chris Thomas (Solo Trombone Mount Charles)
Best Soprano: Les Kneebone (Bodmin) Best Solo Cornet: Kayleigh Rowe (St. Dennis) Best Euphonium: Neil Pascoe (Mount Charles) Best Solo Horn: Graham Barker (Mount Charles) Best Set of Basses: Mount Charles
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Claire Parkyn – St. Dennis Youth, Andrew Julian – St. Dennis Youth
